title: Legal Resistance Network Launches Nationwide Constitutional Defense Program
summary: A collaborative nationwide training initiative emerges, uniting legal professionals across the United States to develop comprehensive constitutional defense strategies. The program brings together the National Lawyers Guild, law schools, and activist networks to create a rapid-response legal education framework addressing democratic challenges.
description: In response to escalating constitutional challenges, a multi-organizational legal resistance network launches a comprehensive training program. The initiative focuses on equipping lawyers, law students, and activists with advanced skills in strategic litigation, know-your-rights education, and rapid legal response mechanisms. Key components include legal observer training, constitutional defense workshops, and community legal support infrastructure.
